org.apache.metamodel.query
Interface QueryItem

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
FilterItem, FromItem, GroupByItem, OrderByItem, SelectItem
public interface QueryItem
extends Serializable

Interface for items in a query. All QueryItems reside within a QueryClause.

See Also:
AbstractQueryClause
